entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
